main event: Four F-80 pilots observed an unidentified object resembling a tow target at Misawa Air Force Base in Japan on 23 August 1949.
interesting points: The object was described as yellow or silver and measured approximately 6 feet high and 30 feet long., Observers estimated the object's speed at 400 miles per hour and noted that it did not resemble an aircraft., The object was in sight for about 30 seconds before disappearing behind a parked R5D-1 aircraft., None of the involved aircraft reported unusual sightings at the time., No radar was operating in the area due to maintenance, leaving observers without corroborative tracking.
sighted object: a yellow or silver rectangular object
witness description: P-80 pilots from the 49th Fighter Group
